document.heading: District of Columbia Solid Waste Management and Multi-Material Recycling Act of 1988 Amendment Temporary Act of 1989

history.narrative: Law 8-93, the “District of Columbia Solid Waste Management and Multi-Material Recycling Act of 1988 Amendment Temporary Act of 1989,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-484. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 5, 1989, and December 19, 1989, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 11, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-144 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. Law 8-93 became effective on March 15, 1990.
